metadata.title: CVE-2020-36781 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: i2c:imx: fix reference leak when pm_runtime_get_sync fails In i2c_imx_xfer()and i2c_imx_remove(), the pm reference count is not expected to beincremented on return. However, pm_runtime_get_sync will increment pmreference count even failed. Forgetting to putting operation will result ina reference leak here. Replace it with pm_runtime_resume_and_get to keepusage counter balanced.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1030.31~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.11.0-1009.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
